author: andschwa
body: Small feature request for build.psm1 that came out of https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/2220. Instead of `Invoke-Expression $sudo` where `$sudo` may or may not be the string `"sudo"`, we should be able to pass `-NoSudo` to `Invoke-NativeExecutable`.
title: Invoke-NativeExecutable -NoSudo
